channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Home buyers are finding the silver lining in a stalled housing market — especially if they’re in this group
item.description: Pending home sales fell in April as buyers pulled back amid economic uncertainty and volatility in the financial markets.

item.title: Salesforce earnings were ‘not bad.’ So why is the stock having its worst day in a year?
item.description: Salesforce’s results weren’t enough to shed lingering growth fears.

item.title: Best Buy’s stock drops after retailer cuts profit outlook on tariff impact

item.title: Trump administration rescinds Biden-era caution about crypto in 401(k) plans: What that means for you
item.description: It may take time to see cryptocurrency retirement-plan options.

item.title: My daughter’s boyfriend, a guest in my home, offered to powerwash part of my house — then demanded money
item.description: “The amount was about what I would have paid to get the whole house done, and not just one side.’

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
